src:
坐月子慘遭尪丟包　陳艾琳躺床痛哭「世界不公平」
05 Nov 2019, 09:46 by 娛樂組
女星陳艾琳經過和前MP魔幻力量阿翔的失敗婚姻後，和同為《大學生了沒》班底的Alex在今年5月再婚，上月才生下一女，重拾幸福的她看來相當快樂，但最近她卻曝光，躺在月子中心，卻被老公丟包痛哭的畫面。


陳艾琳和老公感情甜蜜，常常互相鬥嘴。（翻攝自陳艾琳IG）

陳艾琳產後至今，還處於辛苦的坐月子狀態，日前她因老公Alex外出吃飯，一個人躺在月子中心的她，竟然越想越委屈，越想越孤單，竟然躺在月子中心床上痛哭，陳艾琳還發IG限時動態說：「誰叫你半夜去吃麻辣鍋，丟我一個人等到一點沒人回來，這世界太不公平了。」
這個痛哭的畫面也恰好被剛好回來的老公直擊，拍下上傳IG寫說：「顏蘵，妳看媽媽生妳的時候，哭到雙下巴都出來了，還學豬叫。妳知道為什麼嗎？因為她覺得她在月子中心好無聊喔，無聊到哭爸。」夫妻倆互相鬥嘴互整，也是陳艾琳在坐月子期間的小小樂趣，也看的出來夫妻倆的甜蜜。
陳艾琳也解釋，其實坐月子還是有很多事要做，「只是吃飯一個人、擠奶一個人、餵奶一個人，久了真的滿悶。」
更新時間｜2019.11.05 09:44
text:
The confinement of the moon has been lost. Chen Ai Lin is lying in bed and crying "The world is not fair."
05 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Entertainment Group
Actress Chen Ailin and her former MP magic power A Xiang's failed marriage, and the same as the "college students did not" team Alex remarried in May this year, only gave birth to a woman last month, regaining happiness she looks quite happy But recently she was exposed, lying in the center of the month, but was lost by her husband.


Chen Ailin and her husband have sweet feelings and often bicker with each other. (Reviewed from Chen Ai Lin IG)

Chen Ai-lin has been in a difficult confinement since birth. Recently, she went out to eat for her husband Alex. She was lying in the center of the month. She even wanted to be more wronged. The more she wanted to be alone, she was lying on the bed in the center of the month. Chen Ai-Lin also issued an IG limited time dynamic saying: "Who told you to go to the spicy pot in the middle of the night, throwing me alone and waiting for someone to come back, the world is too unfair."
This crying picture also happened to be directly hit by the husband who just came back. I photographed and uploaded the IG and wrote: "Yan Yan, when I saw my mother's oysters, I cried and both chins came out, and I also learned to call pigs. Do you know why? Because she thinks she is bored in the center of the month, boring to cry daddy." The couple bickering each other, is also the little fun of Chen Ailin during the confinement, but also the sweetness of the couple.
Chen Ai-lin also explained that in fact, there is still a lot to do in the confinement. "Just eating a person, milking a person, feeding a person, it’s really full of stuff for a long time."
Update time|2019.11.05 09:44
